com.github.lucbui.pipeline.pipes

Class SwitchPipe<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.github.lucbui.pipeline.pipes.SwitchPipe<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T -
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    DoublePipe<T>, ReadPipe<T>, WritePipe<T>

    public class SwitchPipe<T>
extends java.lang.Object
implements DoublePipe<T>
    A pipe which goes down one of several pipelines depending on the outcome of a Predicate
